text:
Hello everyone,
for a couple of days I've been encountering issues during API login.
betfairlightweight.exceptions.APIError: None
Params: None
Exception: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='<http://identitysso-cert.betfair.it|identitysso-cert.betfair.it>', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /api/certlogin (Caused by ConnectTimeoutError(<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0x71de1340>, 'Connection to <http://identitysso-cert.betfair.it|identitysso-cert.betfair.it> timed out. (connect timeout=3.05)'))
This has never happened to me before, but these days I'm getting this message almost 80% of the time. What can I check to resolve it?
